video_prompt: Chrome-plated human figure gracefully rotates, arms extending, legs bending, traversing through a dynamic background. Red and white swathes morph into blackness. Sparkling particles scatter and swirl around the figure.
image_prompt: Vertical image: Dynamic chrome female android in mid-air, reflecting vibrant red and white background transitioning to black. Subtle etched details, bright highlights, and sparkling particles enhance the futuristic, ethereal feel.
refined_video_prompt: A figure gracefully rotates, arms extending, legs bending, traversing space. Red and white swathes dynamically morph into swirling blackness behind it. Sparkling particles continuously scatter and swirl around the moving form.
